name: TrickleStar,smart-plug,DEV
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
First, you need at least one TrickleStar Smart-Plug. If you do have one, please follow the procedures:
1. Install TrickleStar Smart-Plug app on Android or iOS app
2. Sign up an TrickleStar Smart-Plug account via TrickleStar Smart-Plug app
3. Set up a TrickleStar Smart-Plug
4. Tap on [Enable Skill] to add an TrickleStar Smart-Plug skill to your Alexa App and link your TrickleStar Smart-Plug account with your Amazon Echo account
5. Go to “Smart Home” from the side menu of the Alexa app
6. Tap on [Discover devices] to search your TrickleStar Smart-Plug 
7. Add your TrickleStar Smart-Plug to the Alexa app
